gist.headline: OpenClaw gets a fresh coat
gist.blurb: Our OpenClaw app just got a visual upgrade with proper branding, fixed fonts, and a mobile-friendly header. The crab is looking sharp!
gist.summary: Updated the OpenClaw application with proper Pollinations branding, including new favicons, SVGs, and corrected font weights.
gist.impact: Users will see a more polished, consistent interface with correct logos and better mobile responsiveness.
gist.visual_concept: OpenClaw project represented by a cute crab mascot. The PR is about branding/visual polish. Scene: The Pollinations bee and the crab mascot working together on a design upgrade.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot and a cute pixel art crab character polishing a shiny digital sign together. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
